verses.plain: Wisdom reacheth from one end to another mightily: and sweetly doth she order all things.

tokens.t: Wisdom reacheth from one end to another mightily: and sweetly doth she order all things.

verses.plain: I loved her, and sought her out from my youth, I desired to make her my spouse, and I was a lover of her beauty.

tokens.t: I loved her, and sought her out from my youth, I desired to make her my spouse, and I was a lover of her beauty.

verses.plain: In that she is conversant with God, she magnifieth her nobility: yea, the Lord of all things himself loved her.

tokens.t: In that she is conversant with God, she magnifieth her nobility: yea, the Lord of all things himself loved her.

verses.plain: For she is privy to the mysteries of the knowledge of God, and a lover of his works.

tokens.t: For she is privy to the mysteries of the knowledge of God, and a lover of his works.

verses.plain: If riches be a possession to be desired in this life; what is richer than wisdom, that worketh all things?

tokens.t: If riches be a possession to be desired in this life; what is richer than wisdom, that worketh all things?

verses.plain: And if prudence work; who of all that are is a more cunning workman than she?

tokens.t: And if prudence work; who of all that are is a more cunning workman than she?

verses.plain: And if a man love righteousness her labours are virtues: for she teacheth temperance and prudence, justice and fortitude: which are such things, as men can have nothing more profitable in their life.

tokens.t: And if a man love righteousness her labours are virtues: for she teacheth temperance and prudence, justice and fortitude: which are such things, as men can have nothing more profitable in their life.

verses.plain: If a man desire much experience, she knoweth things of old, and conjectureth aright what is to come: she knoweth the subtilties of speeches, and can expound dark sentences: she foreseeth signs and wonders, and the events of seasons and times.

tokens.t: If a man desire much experience, she knoweth things of old, and conjectureth aright what is to come: she knoweth the subtilties of speeches, and can expound dark sentences: she foreseeth signs and wonders, and the events of seasons and times.

verses.plain: Therefore I purposed to take her to me to live with me, knowing that she would be a counsellor of good things, and a comfort in cares and grief.

tokens.t: Therefore I purposed to take her to me to live with me, knowing that she would be a counsellor of good things, and a comfort in cares and grief.

verses.plain: For her sake I shall have estimation among the multitude, and honour with the elders, though I be young.

tokens.t: For her sake I shall have estimation among the multitude, and honour with the elders, though I be young.

verses.plain: I shall be found of a quick conceit in judgment, and shall be admired in the sight of great men.

tokens.t: I shall be found of a quick conceit in judgment, and shall be admired in the sight of great men.

verses.plain: When I hold my tongue, they shall bide my leisure, and when I speak, they shall give good ear unto me: if I talk much, they shall lay their hands upon their mouth.

tokens.t: When I hold my tongue, they shall bide my leisure, and when I speak, they shall give good ear unto me: if I talk much, they shall lay their hands upon their mouth.

verses.plain: Moreover by the means of her I shall obtain immortality, and leave behind me an everlasting memorial to them that come after me.

tokens.t: Moreover by the means of her I shall obtain immortality, and leave behind me an everlasting memorial to them that come after me.

verses.plain: I shall set the people in order, and the nations shall be subject unto me.

tokens.t: I shall set the people in order, and the nations shall be subject unto me.

verses.plain: Horrible tyrants shall be afraid, when they do but hear of me; I shall be found good among the multitude, and valiant in war.

tokens.t: Horrible tyrants shall be afraid, when they do but hear of me; I shall be found good among the multitude, and valiant in war.

verses.plain: After I am come into mine house, I will repose myself with her: for her conversation hath no bitterness; and to live with her hath no sorrow, but mirth and joy.

tokens.t: After I am come into mine house, I will repose myself with her: for her conversation hath no bitterness; and to live with her hath no sorrow, but mirth and joy.

verses.plain: Now when I considered these things in myself, and pondered them in my heart, how that to be allied unto wisdom is immortality;

tokens.t: Now when I considered these things in myself, and pondered them in my heart, how that to be allied unto wisdom is immortality;

verses.plain: And great pleasure it is to have her friendship; and in the works of her hands are infinite riches; and in the exercise of conference with her, prudence; and in talking with her, a good report; I went about seeking how to take her to me.

tokens.t: And great pleasure it is to have her friendship; and in the works of her hands are infinite riches; and in the exercise of conference with her, prudence; and in talking with her, a good report; I went about seeking how to take her to me.

verses.plain: For I was a witty child, and had a good spirit.

tokens.t: For I was a witty child, and had a good spirit.

verses.plain: Yea rather, being good, I came into a body undefiled.

tokens.t: Yea rather, being good, I came into a body undefiled.

verses.plain: Nevertheless, when I perceived that I could not otherwise obtain her, except God gave her me; and that was a point of wisdom also to know whose gift she was; I prayed unto the Lord, and besought him, and with my whole heart I said,

tokens.t: Nevertheless, when I perceived that I could not otherwise obtain her, except God gave her me; and that was a point of wisdom also to know whose gift she was; I prayed unto the Lord, and besought him, and with my whole heart I said,
